Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Chronic CYP administration significantly ( P < or = . 002 ) increased bladder weight by 60 % and increased ( 7 - to 11 - fold ) the numbers of NOS - immunoreactive ( IR ) afferent neurons in the L6 - S1 DRG .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Chronic CYP administration |

In this paragraph, "Chronic CYP administration" is the disease or condition being referred to. The paragraph describes the effects of this condition on the bladder and the L6-S1 DRG (Lumbar 6-Sacral 1 dorsal root ganglion). Specifically, it mentions that chronic CYP administration increases bladder weight by 60% and increases the numbers of NOS-immunoreactive (IR) afferent neurons in the L6-S1 DRG by 7- to 11-fold. Therefore, "Chronic CYP administration" is the valid disease entity in this paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| Chronic CYP administration |

In the given paragraph, only "Chronic CYP administration" clearly refers to a disease or condition. Therefore, it is the only valid entity to include in the table. The other terms mentioned in the paragraph, such as "bladder weight," "numbers of NOS-immunoreactive (IR) afferent neurons," and "L6-S1 DRG," do not refer to diseases but rather describe the effects of the chronic CYP administration on the body.
